title: BIOS chip on 820-3662
message: I replaced the BIOS chip on 820-3662 due to computer getting stuck on Apple Logo.  ASD was failing system Management Engine test.  Now computer boots to user screen, but after password is entered the user will load halfway???  I run ASD again and it still is failing?? Any ideas??

title: BIOS chip on 820-3662
message: Now it boots after SMC reset, anyone know what the problem is or was??

title: BIOS chip on 820-3662
message: Also there is no serial number listed now under about Mac??

title: BIOS chip on 820-3662
message: Your "NEW" chip does not have a clean ME region, you need a clean ME region, the ME region from original bios is also bad......

title: BIOS chip on 820-3662
message: How can I clean the ME region?
